channel.title: CVE Feed for scriptcoil -- Mobile browser color select
channel.description: The latest CVEs for scriptcoil -- Mobile browser color select

item.title: CVE-2022-1969|2024-08-03T00:24:43.957Z -- scriptcoil -- mobile%20browser%20color%20select
item.description: The Mobile browser color select plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 1.0.1. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the admin_update_data() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject malicious web scripts via forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
